name: Wild Resurgence
trigger: once on each of your turns if you have no uses of Wild Shape left
effects: you can gain one use of Wild Shape by expending a spell slot (no action required)
you can expend one use of Wild Shape to gain a level 1 spell slot (no action required)
limits: you can gain only one Wild Shape use in this way per turn
you can gain a level 1 spell slot this way only once per long rest
